Localization.Name: Lightning Power Ltd.
Localization.Description: Made out of less expensive materials, Lightning Power continues to introduce new aesthetic changes to their ship components while relying on tried and true technology to run them.

English.Name: Lightning Power Ltd.
English.Description: Made out of less expensive materials, Lightning Power continues to introduce new aesthetic changes to their ship components while relying on tried and true technology to run them.

Localization.Name: FlashFreeze
Localization.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Lightning Power Ltd. 
Size: 1
Grade: B
Class: Civilian

With the FlashFreeze, Lightning Power makes sure that no matter how hot things get, you can rely on its proven cooling technology to keep you flying.
